claims.object: The accumulation of a protein at a given site
mechanisms to ensure required protein components are present at the sites and at an adequate concentration

surface_layer.definition: Protein localization is the accumulation of a protein at a given site.

deep_layer.mechanism: Mechanisms ensure required protein components are present at the sites and at an adequate concentration.
deep_layer.origin: In order for subcellular processes to be carried out within defined compartments or cellular regions.
